sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Russian troops continue war drills close to the border with Ukraine. But after talks with U.S. officials in Geneva, Moscow maintains it has no plans to invade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Russia and Romania battle a surge in coronavirus cases. On Friday, both countries registered a record number of daily infections.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Gale force winds and blizzards have brought traffic on the highways between Poland and the Baltic states to a standstill, while causing major destruction.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It's terrible and scary, but we are ready to fight back any possible attacks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: That's according to residents and troops in eastern Ukraine, as the country waits for any early signs of an invasion from neighbouring Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: as the country waits for any early signs of an invasion from neighbouring Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: However, with fears of an assault running high, the Secretary-General of the United Nations says confrontation should be avoided at all costs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: Thank you very much, Mr Secretary-General. It is clear that my message is that there should not be any military intervention in this context.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I think that diplomacy is the way to solve problems.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Of course, any invasion by one country to another country is against international law, and I hope that this, of course, will not happen in the present circumstances. I am convinced it will not happen and I strongly hope to be right.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: With some 100,000 soldiers stationed at the border, Moscow maintains it has no plans to invade the former Soviet republic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But the US and its allies are not convinced.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: This comes as US and Russian officials met in Geneva on Friday, where US Secretary of State Anthony Blinken once again urged Moscow to recall its troops, stating the West is committed to diplomacy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Russia registered 49,513 new coronavirus cases on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: This is the highest daily number of infections recorded in the country since the pandemic began. Health authorities say the surge has been driven by the highly contagious Omicron strain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Romania has also hit a new daily maximum of nearly 20,000 COVID-19 cases. While hospitalisations and deaths are significantly lower compared to the previous wave, the vaccination uptake is the second lowest in the EU.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In Poland, Prime Minister Mateusz Morawiecki says the country has entered its fifth wave, while free antigen tests will now be provided in pharmacies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Moving East, Belgium broadcasted the introduction of a corona barometer from next Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The colour-coded system will determine what type of restrictions will be put in place against the number of patients in hospitals and ICU wards.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And in a surprising move, Ireland's Taoiseach Micheál Martin declared that almost all Covid restrictions will be lifted from 6am on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The only rules that will remain in place will be face masks, self-isolation after positive test results and Covid passes for international travel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Finally, in Denmark, the BA.2 sub-variant of Omicron is taking hold, but so far there doesn't appear too much cause for concern.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: However, there is a possibility it might be more transmissible.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Friday's airstrike on a Houthi-controlled prison in Saada, Yemen, has claimed the lives of at least 82 people. That's according to the charity mission Doctors Without Borders. The bomb is the latest assault in the ongoing civil war between the internationally recognised Saudi-led coalition and the Iranian-backed Houthis. The escalation comes after the rebels claimed responsibility for a drone and missile attack in Abu Dhabi earlier this week. Newly elected lawmakers exchanged blows at the Honduras Congress on Friday in chaotic scenes as a new provisional board of directors was chosen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The dispute was among members of President-elect Xiomara Castro's party after 20 rebel members proposed George Kalix as the provisional Congress president.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It was the first sitting since the 128-member Congress was elected last November.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Rio de Janeiro and Sao Paulo are postponing the glittering parades that are the highlight of carnival festivities due to a surge in coronavirus infections. The Brazilian cities made the announcement in a joint statement on Friday, while the processions have been rescheduled for April. The pandemic has killed more than 62,000 people in Brazil and the country is in the middle of yet another wave, fueled by the Omicron variant of the virus. Zen Buddhist monk Thich Nhat Hanh, who helped pioneer the concept of mindfulness in the West and socially engaged Buddhism in the East, has died at the age of 95. The monk passed away peacefully at Thu Hieu Temple in Hue, Vietnam.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: He is remembered for distilling Buddhist teachings on compassion and suffering, influencing prominent people such as Oprah Winfrey while dedicating his life to the spread of peace.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Snowstorms have wreaked havoc on a 55-kilometre stretch of main road between Poland and the Baltic states.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The strong winds and blizzards which have battered the highways between the southern Lithuanian city of Mari Hampole and the Polish border have caused countless accidents, forced trucks into ditches and brought vehicles to a standstill while blocking access to snowplows.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The E67 motorway is the main artery between Central Europe and the Baltic states, connecting Prague, Warsaw, Kaunas, Riga, Tallinn and Helsinki.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: However the stretch between Marihanpole and the Polish border is mostly single lane.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: According to Lithuanian regulations, truck owners themselves are responsible for dealing with accidents which has delayed the removal of stuck vehicles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, western parts of Lithuania have also suffered from strong winds.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A few buses slid off the roads while postal services have warned of delays.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The main port of Kleipada has been closed since last Wednesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And in the most popular resort of Palanga, gale-force gusts uprooted trees and destroyed restaurant patios.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A river also overflowed its banks while a wooded pier was damaged.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_19
sentences.sentence: New Hope is the name of this tailor's shop at the heart of Caserta, south of Italy, where 80 women of different origin and backgrounds work together to give themselves the chance of being independent and live their lives freely.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_19
sentences.sentence: It started almost 20 years ago as a way to give migrant women, mainly of African origin, the chance to set free from the legacy of human trafficking and start a new life.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Thanks to an order of a thousand bags from the regional administration in 2004, we had the strength and courage to invest what we'd earned in order to give the girls the possibility to keep dreaming through this tailor shop.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_19
sentences.sentence: Today this tailor shop has opened its doors to all women who want to take control of their own lives.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_19
sentences.sentence: They've put their past behind them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_19
sentences.sentence: What matters now is what they do here, now.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: We put that here, everything they are doing. Take all of them, talk about something. There's a message, send it to other people. There's hope, there's like experience, many things they are trying to explain to people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_19
sentences.sentence: From the darkness of the past to the colours of a new life, for these women this fabric is not only a way of earning their living but it also represents a tangible sign of their liberation from oppressive conditions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We want to be an example.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Women are strong enough to pursue their dreams, to be the protagonist of their own life and their family life, not only as mothers and wives, but also as independent women with their own job.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_19
sentences.sentence: Each product in this shop tells the story of a woman who believes in the chance of starting a new life, whether they are migrants or Italians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: I chose to resign from the marketing agency I was working for and came here to work in this cooperative.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: I made this choice with my heart because it's nice to see the smiles back on these women's faces when they can take their lives back through their work.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A story behind each product, quality and beauty reflecting the dignity of work.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: This is the new hope, Taylor's Shop.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_19
sentences.sentence: Luca Palamara for Euronews, Caserta.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: Tate Modern in London will pay tribute to Lubaina Hemed, a major player in the black arts movement, advocating for the recognition of black experience and women's creativity in visual arts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: Taking her inspiration from the theater design, the artist creates a series of scenes, placing you both at the center of the action and backstage, looking in.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: In 2017, Himid won the respectable Turner Prize.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: The Paris Philharmonic will host Hip Hop 360, an interactive and immersive exhibition that explores all the facets of this art form, born in the streets of the Bronx in the early 80s.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: The exhibition traces 40 years of history of a music that has changed the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: Photographs and documents from witnesses to the history of hip-hop are featured in this retrospective.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: The Reina Sofia Museum in Madrid presents the reorganization of its own collection, which includes a selection of around 2,000 pieces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: It includes contemporary artwork from the 80s to the present day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: What stands out in the new show is not the chronological order of events, but the relationship that we can peel back or trace from our perspective in the present.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: The museum has created eight interlinked episodes that combine to tell new stories by crossing eras and artistic styles. Coming up on Euronews.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Sweden wants its main central throughway to be green, so charging points for electric vehicles are being installed all along the route.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: That's coming up on Smart Regions. inspiration delivered straight to your inbox. Sign up on euronews.com forward slash travel. Midsrocket, literally the middle road, is one of Sweden's most important routes, providing an east-west passage towards Norway.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Jimmy uses it from time to time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: It's a snow-white road in the winter months, but a European project is aiming to make it green all year round.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: How?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: By increasing the number of electric vehicle charging points at all the train stations along the route.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The aim is to promote mixed transport and reduce the carbon emissions produced by passenger transport.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: When I'm travelling it's nice to be able to charge the car during my stay in the city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: It's a little bit more expensive if I compare it to charging at home, but it's not that expensive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: It's three Swedish crowns per kilowatt hour.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: These terminals work with a badge or an application that indicates in real time what charging points are available and their location.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The Lade-Emitz rocket project has a budget of a little over 800,000 euros, of which half is financed by the European Cohesion Policy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: There are 85 charging stations planned for more than 200,000 potential users, who live along the 358-kilometre stretch between Sönsvall and Storlien.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Sweden boasts the largest number of electric vehicles in the European Union.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The project aims to ensure even those living in sparsely populated areas have access to charging points.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The train and the public transportation is good here, but it's sometimes difficult to reach your end destination with public transport. So you might need a car.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: We want to give the people equal opportunities here to own and use your electric vehicle, just as you would anywhere else in Sweden that is more populated than here.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The installation of the charging point started in January 2021 and should be completed this year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: But here in Ore, teams can only work when the weather allows them to, and the harsh conditions aren't the only difficulty.

sentences.sentence: I'd say that the main challenges in this type of project is, for one, coordinating several different parallel processes with the property owners, the grid company, the national transportation authorities that owns the roads.
